item.title: Differential Privacy: A Primer for a Non-technical Audience
item.description: Differential Privacy: A Primer for a Non-technical Audience. Kobbi Nissim; Thomas Steinke; Alexandra Wood; Micah Altman; Aaron Bembenek; Mark Bun; Marco Gaboardi; David R. O'Brien; Salil Vadhan. https://www.ftc.gov/system/files/documents/public_comments/2017/11/00023-141742.pdf . May 7, 2017. What Does DP Guarantee? It is a question of whether a particular computation (not output) preserves privacy. DP only guarantees that no information specific to an individual is revealed by the computation. DP doesn’t protect against information that could be learned even with an individual opting out of a dataset, e.
